summary: bat files to make your shadowscale more believable starting out
descriptionHtml:
Shadow Scales are Argonian assassins, trained mercilessly from the moment they hatch, bred to be the ultimate killer and servant of Sithis. so why, oh why are you so rubbish?!, I mean did getting caught crossing the boarder really wipe away all of those years of hard wired training?

anyway I got sick of it so I wrote a batch file, it will instantly make you a more believable assassin

what does this do? it's a small file you place into your Skyrim folder(where the .EXE is)
when you enter the game and open the console, type in Bat ShadowScale

it will instantly level Archery, Alchemy, Sneak, One Handed, Light Armor, Lockpicking and Pickpocket to 100 giving you around 30+ levels
if you don't want to level just change "AdvSkill to SetSkill"
it also adds a handful of helpful spells like Frenzy, and Rout

I'll also include an optional bat for Shadow Scales who think they should be able to shout straight up, it's only 3 shouts, Become Ethereal, Whirlwind Sprint and Throw Voice

now while most would argue that Picking Pockets is useless for an assassin because you can loot your victims when they are dead, I somewhat agree but there are a plethora of poisons out there that you can place onto your targetsÂ
author: Jessica
